area: Mull of Galloway to Mull of Kintyre including the Firth of Clyde and North Channel (14)

forecast.wind: Southerly, veering southwesterly, 3 to 5, occasionally 6 at first, backing southerly 3 or 4 later.
forecast.sea: Slight or moderate, occasionally smooth in the Firth of Clyde.
forecast.weather: Rain then showers, thundery at first.
